title: Studio Resources
content:
SES # INSTRUCTOR’s PLAN FOR STUDIO IN-CLASS SLIDES SUPPORTING FILES POST-CLASS SLIDES S1 Studio 1 Plan (TXT) Birthday matches; Introduction to R (PDF) Code for Studio 1 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r files.)
Studio 1: Birthdays (R)
Studio 1 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S2 Studio 2 Plan (TXT) Expectation; Simulation using R (PDF) Code for Studio 2 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r files.)
Tutorial on “For” Loops
Studio 2 Slides with Solutions (PDF)
Expanded Solutions for Studio 2 (PDF)
S3 This studio is split between a continuation of class 5 and a standard studio. The class 5 materials include:
Reading: Continuation of class 5: Gallery of continuous variables; histograms (PDF) Reading: Manipulating random variables (PDF Studio 3 Plan (TXT) Gallery of continuous variables; histograms (PDF) Code for Studio 3 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r files.) Studio 3 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S4 Studio 4 Plan (TXT) Covariance, correlation, CLT (PDF) Code for Studio 4 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r files.) Studio 4 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S5 Studio 5 Plan (TXT) Bayesian updating (PDF) Code for Studio 5 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r files.) Studio 5 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S6 Studio 6 Plan (TXT) Continuous data, continuous priors (PDF) Code for Studio 6 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 4 .r and 2 .csv files.) Studio 6 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S7 No studio S8 Studio 8 Plan (TXT) Rejection regions; NHST (PDF) Code for Studio 8 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 1 .r file.) Studio 8 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S9 Studio 9 Plan (TXT) NHST; comparing frequentist and Bayesian methods (PDF) Code for Studio 9 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r file and 1 .tbl file) Studio 9 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S10 Exam 2 S11 Studio 11 Plan (TXT) Confidence intervals III (PDF) Code for Studio 11 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 2 .r and 1 .csv file.) Studio 11 Slides with Solutions (PDF) S12 Studio 12 Plan (TXT) Bootstrapping; linear regression (PDF) Code for Studio 12 (ZIP) (This ZIP file contains: 3 .r and 3 .csv files.) Studio 12 Slides with Solutions (PDF)
